Phrase: Queensway did not show up for remedial class in time.
The members of the Special Steel Squad, concerned that she would normally not be late, decided to go to the training ground to check on her to see if something had happened to her.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Maybe she collapsed while training alone.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: She does try too hard sometimes...'

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: I can't believe Queensway is late, I can only foresee an incident.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: And we are all worried about Queensway's safety...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: There's no point in hiding, I know you're here!

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I will not allow anyone to threaten the peace of the academy, for I am a knight of St. Iris!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Any Queensway was easily spotted. She seems to be practising her theatrical performance in an empty locker room.

Name: Putra
Phrase: What theatrical performance?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Well, it kinda sorta looks like it...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Now, show yourself. Break the sorcery you have cast on the training grounds and surrender.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I don't want to use physical force on you if I can help it. Come out before I finish counting to five.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Quite an impressive actress.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Of course not! It's an incident no matter how we look at it. We have to ask her what happened.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Queensway! I don't know what happened, but we're going to help you.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Miss Yakutsk, and Conductor sir too! What happened to the remedial classes?

Name: Putra
Phrase: It doesn't matter. All that matters is that Queensway is safe.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Yes, that's right. I don't care about remedial classes. I don't care if it's cancelled at all.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: We're skipping make-up lessons and solving an incident at the same time. Killing two birds with one stone.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Explain what happened, but keep it simple so these three carefree musketeers accompanying us can understand.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Intruders. Two women of unknown affiliation have entered the Academy.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Intruders?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: But this is an Allied Forces garrison. I don't think outsiders can get in that easily.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: One of them is a powerful sorceress. She used a special sorcery to get in by the dormitories.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I was on the lookout for them when I heard they've escaped to the training grounds. I saw two figures in this locker room earlier...

Name: Putra
Phrase: So that's what happened when we were in the classroom cleaning away pasta.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: But it really was just a few minutes ago, wasn't it? Who on earth did Queensway get the information about the intruders from?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Miss Ohana.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Aaaah-

Name: Putra
Phrase: That's a reliable source.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: What's the nature of the persons you're dealing with?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I only glimpsed them for a moment, so I can't be sure exactly. They were both small. One of them is likely a Nishikese. She had big ears, so...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Weapons?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Armed. The other one had what looked like a sword on her hip.
Armed intruders are a serious matter. As Vivienne said earlier, it is not easy for an outsider to break into this academy. It is necessary to immediately seize them and ascertain their identity.
Just to confirm one thing with Queensway, you are sure that the intruder escaped into this locker room?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I'm sure of it. She must be hiding in one of these lockers.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Then why don't we just open the lockers one by one?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: That's right. Smash them if we can't open it.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Sei sei sei. You can't use gorilla warfare. They have weapons and they can use sorcery.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Euh- What are going to do then? Do we blow up the whole training ground with magic to be on the safe side?

Name: Putra
Phrase: You're a gorilla alright. The only difference is whether if it's a gorilla or a magical gorilla.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: What do we do, Versailles? Some scary people have gathered here. What is a magical gorilla?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I can't believe that Miyako's cognitive inhibition doesn't work on someone who isn't a sorceress. That knight Queensway or whatever she's called, she's something else.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: If they know we're hiding, I guess we better surrender. You said that too, Versailles. If we tell them what happened, I'm sure they'll understand.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I considered the option, but then I changed my mind. The people in this world are more belligerent than we thought. If we didn't choose the right people to talk to, we could be imprisoned.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: You felt it too, Miyako. That terrifying aura that pervades the entire dormitory. I sensed a murderous intent that would never tolerate intruders.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Yes, there was definitely 'something' there. I couldn't even stand steady in front of the entrance.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Anyway, let's get this over with. We need to get hold of the Divine Child and talk to her directly...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: That means threatening a Divine Child directly, doesn't it? I don't think we'd be in this situation right now if we could do so in the first place.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Miyako, please cast a stronger sorcery. I want them to be distracted away from this locker room.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: No, I can't. If I do that, we'll really become criminals.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: I'm still haven't got used to the magic channel of Iris Cloud. I can't control my power properly. It's better not to use sorceries that are too strong...

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Don't worry. I trust Miyako will be able to do it.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: 'Ugh, you're always like this, Versailles.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: If you insist.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Maybe if I make a loud noise and blame it on the animals we can get away with it...

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Good idea, Miyako! Get right on it.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: I hope it works.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: What the! The training dummies in the training area are moving on their own!

Name: Putra
Phrase: And there are quite a few of them! And they look very strong!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Oooooh- I sense some kind of powerful sorcery. Has someone taken over the training grounds?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: This is Hardcore Mode, by the way. It is rarely used, even in Instructor Finchley's special training. This is a special mode for hard Spanking-style specifications.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: What a lovely remedial lesson.

Name: Putra
Phrase: But I'd rather do this than study!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Me too!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: My my, everyone's so athletic.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Awawawawa... Gosh, t-they may be in big trouble.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I-I'm sure they'll be fine. It's not like there really was a Phantom Mist!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: That's right! That smart-looking girl said there was a mode like this!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: What was it? Is it the hard Spanking mode?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Oui, that's the one. Just pretend the training programme malfunctioned, so it's probably fine...

Name: Versailles
Phrase: ...If it looks really bad, we'll come to their aid.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Agreed.
